q_en: Which order has the fastest completion progress among the unfinished orders?
gt:
Sure! Let's take a look at the unfinished orders and see which one has the fastest completion progress. Here's a summary of the completion progress for each order:

| Order Name                  | Completion Progress |
|-----------------------------|---------------------|
| PolyU_Tshirt                | 100.00%             |
| John_Pants                  | 100.00%             |
| Emily_Dress                 | 85.19%              |
| James_WinterOrder           | 100.00%             |
| Sophia_SkirtAndJacket       | 100.00%             |
| Michael_SweaterAndShorts    | 74.24%              |
| Olivia_WinterOrder          | 100.00%             |
| William_Skirt_Sweater_Shorts| 100.00%             |
| PolyU_Skirt                 | 100.00%             |
| John_Jacket                 | 0.00%               |
| Emily_Pants                 | 0.00%               |
| James_Skirt                 | 0.00%               |

The order with the fastest completion progress among the unfinished ones is **William_Skirt_Sweater_Shorts** with a completion progress of 100%! üéâ Keep up the great work! üòÑ

steps.sql: SELECT o.id, o.order_name FROM orders o JOIN order_product op ON o.id = op.order_id JOIN sewing_tasks st ON op.id = st.order_product_id WHERE st.status != 2 GROUP BY o.id;
steps.description: Retrieve the IDs and names of all unfinished orders

steps.sql: SELECT o.id, o.order_name, SUM(st.completed_number) / SUM(op.number) AS completion_progress FROM orders o JOIN order_product op ON o.id = op.order_id JOIN sewing_tasks st ON op.id = st.order_product_id WHERE st.status != 2 GROUP BY o.id;
steps.description: Calculate the completion progress for each unfinished order

steps.sql: SELECT order_name FROM (SELECT o.id, o.order_name, SUM(st.completed_number) / SUM(op.number) AS completion_progress FROM orders o JOIN order_product op ON o.id = op.order_id JOIN sewing_tasks st ON op.id = st.order_product_id WHERE st.status != 2 GROUP BY o.id) AS order_progress ORDER BY completion_progress DESC LIMIT 1;
steps.description: Identify the order with the highest completion progress
